May 7, 2017 D Giron de Musique de la Glâne
Giron de Musique de la Glâne, FR 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Konzertmusik - Expertise (Switzerland) giron-de-musique-de-la-glane
Other
Promasens, FR, Switzerland > held on May 6th & 7th
14 Bands competed (mixed Brass/Wind, Own Choice and Marching; not ranked).
Experts A: Sagnol, Rody / Experts B: Fellay, Hayoz Experts Marching: Fellay, Hayoz & Edgar Etter
At this Edition there was a sep. Show-Contest with Fanfare de Mont-sur-Rolle, Courtion et Forel (Lavaux). See at > https://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/show-contest-giron-de-musique-de-la-glane/2017-05-06/
May 1, 2016, 12:50 p.m. June 19, 2017, 8:46 a.m.
